A4.text: Armenia, officially the Republic of Armenia, is a landlocked country in the Armenian highlands of West Asia.

A5.text: While Armenia is geographically located in the South Caucasus, it views itself as part of Europe and is generally considered geopolitically European.

A6.text: Armenia is located in the southern Caucasus, the region southwest of Russia between the Black Sea and the Caspian Sea.

A7.text: Armenia is geographically located in the South Caucasus.
